page.title: 01Farming...A case study.
page.content: We visited Mr.Bowdens farm to investigate the animals that he keeps on the farm unit. We designed a questionaire to discover the facts.Mr. Bowden has approx 150 acres of land divided into 20 fields used mainly for cattle grazing.{He has 160 FRIESIAN {cows of which 90 are milked each {day.Each cow produces on average {between 2 and 7 gallons of milk each day.Mr. BOWDEN also keeps 800 pigs. These are kept in special pig houses. The pigs are kept in these all their life. This method is called {FACTORY {FARMING.}Mr. Bowden also rears 8500 carp for ornamental ponds in the leisure market. The Bowden family have lived on this farm for 40 years. Mr. BOWDEN HAS BEEN IN CHARGE FOR 10 years. {It is typical of many farms in {SOUTH WEST CHESHIRE.6 people work on {the farm. }
